price: (36) They said, "Postpone [the matter of] him and his brother and send among the cities gatherers
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَٱبۡعَثۡ فِي ٱلۡمَدَآئِنِ حَٰشِرِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū arjih wa-akhāhu wa-ib'ʿath fī al-madāini ḥāshirīna
